website_summaries.verdict: Including a baby wellness guide, this high-value kit has your baby’s safety in mind. The 17 pieces are all durable and useful.
pros: 17-piece kit includes most things needed for grooming and maintaining baby wellness
We love how this kit includes a rattle to distract baby during grooming
Kit conveniently has zipper and lies flat for easy access to items
cons: Included medicine measurement spoons are meant for toddlers, not newborns

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible products: The bulb syringe split after 5-6 uses where the cap on top is connected. The nail clippers wouldn’t cut through baby’s nails. The thermometer is WAY off, at least 4 degrees compared to another thermometer (used orally) and it says you can use the same thermometer for oral, under arm and rectal temps which isn’t recommended...plus, that’s gross. Only decent product was the brush. Ended up buying Nose Frida, a different set of clippers, and a Vick’s rectal thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Trilobes

customer_reviews.title: Great gift that lasts years! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift of my registry, but I [as a nurse] was so impressed with it that I also bought it as a gift for write a few friends who are having babies. Everything is safe, well designed and easy to use for babies and toddlers. Other kits have crazy colors or more, extraneous stuff, this one has the essentials plus a few convenience items in durable materials.
customer_reviews.author: NurseNYC

customer_reviews.title: Received as a gift, rarely use
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift from my registry because I thought for sure I'd need these things! Well, I've barely used anything in the kit and find a lot of it to feel cheaply made. I ended up buying a nicer thermometer and use the nose frieda for their noses. The only thing I've really tried to use is the baby nail clippers and they aren't that great. While this is a very giftable gift, I would say it's not very useful for the reasons I stated above. Would have been nicer to buy the nicer brands and product of the items we really needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lovethefall123

customer_reviews.title: "Deluxe" package is falsely advertise! ONLY comes with 11 ...
customer_reviews.text: "Deluxe" package is falsely advertise! ONLY comes with 11 pieces. The product description is NOT what you receive at home.
customer_reviews.author: Batty

customer_reviews.title: Great all-inclusive product
customer_reviews.text: We originally planned to buy these items separately until we came across the American Red Cross Grooming kit, which offers all the necessities at an attractive price point. Since bringing home our newborn it's already helped us out tremendously - from using thermometer to check his temperature, shortening our son's sharp nails with the file boards, to combing his full head of hair (!), and the bulb syringe aspirator to clear his nose. This is a great product that I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: Useful For A New Baby
customer_reviews.text: This kit was a gift (off our baby registry). Honestly, most of the items we haven't had to use, but it is great to have them all in one place if we needed them. The items are okay quality, they are an okay value for the money. If I had to choose again I would probably buy the 2-3 items (higher quality versions) that we have regularly used rather than this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina Rose

customer_reviews.title: Quality so poor it's dangerous to your baby!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp metal burr on the nail clippers... glad I saw it before it ended up in my son's eye. Red cross is lucky I saw it actually! How awful.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Pezzente

customer_reviews.title: An essential baby item!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and every single thing came in handy in the kit! I purchased it again here on amazon for a friend that is having her baby in July because I believe it is a must have and a lot cheaper than buying all these items separate. The ball syringe is great because it can actually be properly cleaned as it has an airtight hinge top that lets you see inside and make sure there is no mold growing inside as those are known for! Great item!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Newlin

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap set. I bought this because I needed the thermostat during the Coronavirus pandemic and I could not find a single thermostat to purchase anywhere. However it never gave a consistent reading and it was always at least 3 degrees off, telling me that my temperature was in the lower 90's. You would not want to rely on this thermometer for your child's well being!
customer_reviews.author: jhp

customer_reviews.title: Has everything you need
customer_reviews.text: As a first time mom, this has surprised me with everything I didn't know I needed. We've needed the soft toothbrush for cradle cap, the little trimmers for her tiny Velociraptor claws, and a thermometer approved for oral, armpit or rectal... I'm not looking forward to learning what the other items are for, but I'm sure I will!
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: This is so nice, and I'm grateful I found it. What I needed the most was the thermometer. Some of the items, I won't be able to use, but I'll be sure to donate them (and the storage bag) to a family shelter. During these uncertain times I can also understand if the shelter wouldn't accept donations like these. If that's the case, I bet one of the animal shelters might be able to use some of the items to help care for small pets.
customer_reviews.author: element2011

customer_reviews.title: cheaply made but worth the low price i guess
customer_reviews.text: well before I had even removed everything from the plastic casing it comes in, the mirror was broken. Not a huge deal since it isnt one of the essential items in the set but still kind of annoying. the nail clippers broke just from me removing them from the packaging. and honestly the toddler toothbrush i really really wouldnt recommend anyone letting their kid put it in their mouth its gonna break and the bristles are loose and they're more cheaply made than the toothbrush i used in county jail. because of how much stuff you get for a low price i guess its worth it but you get what you pay for so be careful folks
customer_reviews.author: Aoelaigh

customer_reviews.title: Cute but useless
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute add on to a baby gift, but pretty strange that the Red Cross would have a product with very subpar basic baby care. Not a quality product at all. My son liked the brush, and I tossed the rest and stocked the bag with real baby care items that I put some faith in. Original materials almost all broke or didn’t work on the first try.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift, and really happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift, and it was really well liked...and used. A good well priced kit to keep handy in your infant's baby bag. Very good starter safety kit for new moms.
customer_reviews.author: Just trying to help =)

customer_reviews.title: Do I Really Need This?
customer_reviews.text: Well? Do I? The nail clippers on this thing are awful! We also bought a more legitimate thermometer. So the question is... why do I need this kit? I'm not going to remember anything in here actually being useful, and when I finally do need it I'm not going to remember to pull this kit out. Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: the bristle brush isn't soft enough for a newborn. the clippers are bulky and don't let you get a good visual on the nail. Thats so dangerous! overall its cheap quality and the image online didn't have the Red Cross logo when i bought it, so i was a little surprised to see it on all pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Bee M

customer_reviews.title: Love the products just not the bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this little kit but hate the bag. Everything with fall out if you open it all the way. The walls aren’t high enough to lay it down and open it to get what you need. Love the nose sucker in this too. It’s smaller on the end than the one you get at the hospital so it’s fits in my little ones nose easier without it hurting her. Love the comb and brush. Standard thermometer. And the clippers are great for when they get a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: This comes with everything you need. Although that is not the ideal thermometer to include in a kit for infants in my eyes, the price was right and luckily we were able to find what we wanted at Target. We must have been there the day they stocked up!
customer_reviews.author: Grizzzly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice combo of litte things for babies, very handy and the quality it's nice! The only thing I would like to share is that I got this for my sister, and normally she would cleanse the medicine litte thing with warm water, one time she decided to put it on the bottle sterilizer and it melted! Just be aware not to do that, the sterilizer it's too hot for it!
customer_reviews.author: Sahylinn Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set, Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful set. I use the baby nail scissors, medicine dropper and nasal aspirator (the BEST item ever!) the most. The case is made of durable plastic and keeps things organized. Just wish the plastic insert was nicer quality. You really need to keep it in the bag to organize everything and its thin plastic.
customer_reviews.author: CraftyKim

customer_reviews.title: Super annoying 😡
customer_reviews.text: I received a different kit! Did not come with the emery boards and a little mirror instead of a rattle. One of the main reasons I purchased this was for the complete nail care! Since many new moms told me I would need them. Now I have to look for and buy separate emery boards. Super annoying 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely recommending or buying this product for anyone expecting a child. It has all the essentials and the baby brush is as soft as a rabbit's fur. Your kid will definitely be comfortable with all the supplies within, except maybe the thermometer, because no baby is comfortable with a thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: TEK

customer_reviews.title: Purchased multiple
customer_reviews.text: I like everything that comes with it purchased it multiple for my home and husband's car (we have a baby bag in our car with extra items incase we forget something).
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Davis-White aka My Urban Books

customer_reviews.title: Gift from a registry
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift from a registry... not really impressed with it. But it's what they registered for. It looks cheap and like it's not going to last. Hope it works for them!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as an early baby gift when my daughter and SIL got caught unawares and somewhat unprepared- all items useful and necessary.... eventually. Great value in terms of money and time saved buying these one at a time.
customer_reviews.author: DiscerningReader

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Looks different than the pictures and had a mirror instead of the toy (which don’t bother me) and no nail files. The case also doesn’t have little spots for everything like in the picture either. I actually like the one I got better except for it not having the holder spots.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Pinasco

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Compact and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product mainly because I needed a thermometer and with COVID-19 outbreak it was impossible to find a thermometer by itself. Ended up buying this and I love it. Compact and a lot of useful baby care products in one package. Good quality and value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: matildawormwood2011

customer_reviews.title: Includes some basics and some rarely used items
customer_reviews.text: I use the scissors, thermometer and nasal syringe. Haven’t really figured out the other stuff yet. I’m not sure I needed to buy this bag. I could have bought those items separately. But I think this would make a good gift for a new mom.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa K.

customer_reviews.title: Wide variety of high quality first aid
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a new mom-to-be and was very impressed. There is a wide variety of tools used in the first aid of young children. I especially lied that it included a small book about first aid and even included a rattle to entertain the baby as you cared for him or her.
customer_reviews.author: KCarlson

customer_reviews.title: OK product.  Contains a digital Thermometer which is the real reason purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Digital Thermometers are in short supply during the Corona-Virus scare but this was delivered on-time to the NYC area. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: G. Or J. Horn added

customer_reviews.title: Just get it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set, not the prettiest out there but I already bought this twice literally for the nail scissors ✂️ Which are the best I’ve found for baby. The comb and snot sucker are also top notch I’ve also used the finger and full sized tooth brushes in both kits. Will likely buy again
customer_reviews.author: jeffery lawson

customer_reviews.title: Has Everything
customer_reviews.text: Has everything I’ve needed to take care of my baby. The nasal aspirator is washable/reusable and everything else has worked well. The brush is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna F.

customer_reviews.title: What you receive is not what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: This product is falsely advertised. It includes a medicine dropper, a nail clipper, nasal aspirator, thermometer, and a comb. All poor quality. Do not buy. This is a dishonest way of selling.
customer_reviews.author: RoadRunner

customer_reviews.title: Nail clippers not for baby
customer_reviews.text: Love the durable carry case. The nail clippers were not sharp to cut my babies nails. The nose syringe is great with cleaning cap.
customer_reviews.author: L Zunic

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: There is t as much here as I thought and the items feel cheap. Also the bag is so large to display everything in the “window” that once it is just loose in the bag the bag itself it huge and takes up a ton of space when everything could fit in a sandwich bag. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: CrystalCherie

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer doesn’t even work. You have to sit there forever for it to beep and then still is inaccurate.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great product box slightly damaged
customer_reviews.text: Great product especially for price! None other has as much as it does for the price! The box was slightly damaged which is the only reason I didn't give a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Nail clipper is a disappointment not easy or safe to use bc I cut my newborn finger. Kit has no emery board to shorten his nails. I am truly dissatisfied and traumatized. Nail clipper was the main reason for my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Christina Betancourt

customer_reviews.title: Don't need all of this for a baby.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set but I really only use the nail clippers. I would just buy nail trimmers and seperate thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: much needed
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find a kit, during theses difficult times when nothing is available
customer_reviews.author: Events By Nicole Monea

customer_reviews.title: They changed the product!!!
customer_reviews.text: They changed the product!!! Instead a rattle, has a red framed mirror :/ Does not have the four emery boards Even the case is different!!! Im like going.to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. Very handy to have around with our newborn and love the nail clippers. Nail clippers are easy to use, and efficient yet gentle on our newborns little fingers. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Copley

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the rattle
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe it, but the thing we use the most from this kit is actually the rattle... My baby has loved it almost from the beginning. It's the first toy he played with and it's still his favorite. The way it's made makes it easy for even a tiny baby to hold and keep holding. I didn't even notice this thing had a rattle when I bought it! We also periodically use the brush and thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: JKMJH

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Update* Big plus that the bulb is easy to clean. I wish there were slots for each item instead of the plastic display it comes in. Update*The nail clippers is a hassle to use since the white plastic goes to the edge of the clippers making it difficult to trim baby nails.
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: Great for your basic needs.
customer_reviews.text: Has all your basic new baby needs and a couple things I don’t think you’ll ever use but still a better deal than buying a few things individual. They are good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: C Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Items seems very less compared to other competitors not worth it. Quality is not good
customer_reviews.author: Chinni

customer_reviews.title: Bulb easy to clean (A+); Thermometer takes too long (D-)
customer_reviews.text: We've only used the bulb and the thermometer so far. I like that the bulb opens at the back so you can clean and dry it. The thermometer takes way too long for my liking with a fussy baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect for a new baby - we have a newborn and I have already used several items. I love the carrying kit so I know where everything is and I can easily pack it if we travel. I will purchase this again for as a gift for friends of ours that are expecting.
customer_reviews.author: KF14

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer is crap. It takes forever to read, and with an infant, totally not convenient. The medicine cups seem weird. The nail clippers are hard to use. I am very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Loved the kit so much I give it as gifts.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite grooming kit. I got one as a gift for my first baby. Over the years lost pieces and decided I wanted a whole new kit. I also but this set as gifts for expecting parents. I love the little nail scissors. Perfect for tiny newborn fingernails.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndit

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: This kit is very cheap looking. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: genevieve davis

customer_reviews.title: Gift for new mother
customer_reviews.text: This new mother wanted to be sure that her baby won't be missing out on any of her nursing while she attempts to go back to work.
customer_reviews.author: Grangie

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Nice, complete set of all necessities a new parent may need. Fits nicely in diaper bag without taking up too much space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: all you need for a newborn.
customer_reviews.text: really liked this kit, my favorite is a brush using it for hairs.
customer_reviews.author: veli

customer_reviews.title: Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: Had every thing that we needed. Great value for money
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Great kit with everything you need and more
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We don’t use everything included but what we do use is durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Turi

customer_reviews.title: i didn't use much
customer_reviews.text: we bought this as a "just in case" first aid kit for our baby. The things in there you barely use. But i guess it's "good to have" not a "must have" cuz i ended up buying separate things that's similar to the items in this kit. i use the comb and the nail filer for like a month but that's about it. She plays with the toy the most!
customer_reviews.author: bring them on

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Bag
customer_reviews.text: The zipper bag is flimsy makes it very dificult to store the items.
customer_reviews.author: Yosef Tauber

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it from baby registry so it will be given as a gift so I will not be reviewing this item but it looks very nice and well made.
customer_reviews.author: DK Sekely

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: With the red Cross name on it I expected it to be good and it was!
customer_reviews.author: imhappee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think the best and most useful piece is the fingernail clipper scissors. The other pieces feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: ChloeHelene

customer_reviews.title: Bag does not have straps.
customer_reviews.text: Picture is misleading. It doesn't have straps to hold items in place. Otherwise this is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: jkt612

customer_reviews.title: The thermometer is supper cheap, did not last a month. Like a toy.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. It is like a toy for a five year old child.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto C. Fabricio

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I didn't expect for it to have as much inside as it did. I use everything inside except the nail clippers, they are a little tricky to maneuver with a newborn. They med dropper and spoon have been a true life saver for my two year old who hates to take medications.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this kit. You really can't go wrong buying this one. I have seen other kits at major retailers and they are typically more expensive and doesn't have everything this one does. I prefer this one over any that I have seen it stores. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for parents
customer_reviews.text: This case contains everything you will need to care for your newborn health and hygiene
customer_reviews.author: Raisa Irizarry

customer_reviews.title: Great at home first aid kit for little ones
customer_reviews.text: An all in one first kit for the little ones ouchee and boo boo's! Can be placed anywhere in the home where it is easily accessible. It literally has all the first aid needed in the event of a temperature, scrap of the knee, or simply cleaning the nasal passage. First years has made life less complicated because of this quick kit. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: TMM

customer_reviews.title: Some useful and some not so useful items, but still a good kit.
customer_reviews.text: There are some useful and some not as useful items in this set. Mostly useful though. We haven't gotten much use out of the rattle, medicine dispenser and finger toothbrush looking thing. However the little emery boards, nail clippers, comb and brush get very regular use.
customer_reviews.author: LinwoodMommy

customer_reviews.title: All the important stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great gift recipitant was very happy -has all of the essitntal things you need for baby!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and assortment for the price. I bought this because it is unisex and includes all the essentials I was looking for in a compact case.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Jane Hatch

customer_reviews.title: some of the products are nice, others almost useless
customer_reviews.text: some of the products are nice, others almost useless. I'd invest in separate more expensive items to have better quality - thus I woudnt need to by twice some of the items (e.g. had to buy separately nose exudate extractor because the one in the kit doesnt work))
customer_reviews.author: Momchil

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift care around and your day but I gave one to my knees for her baby
customer_reviews.author: Regina

customer_reviews.title: It held up well for the first few weeks of new parenting and seemed very useful. Recommend as a
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a pregnant friend. Was mailed directly to her, so I didn't get a chance to see it prior to arrival. After the baby was born, I visited and saw the kit in their bathroom. It held up well for the first few weeks of new parenting and seemed very useful. Recommend as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Good start but not great
customer_reviews.text: Great for a starter kit, all items are not really sturdy but it does give you an idea of what you personally use and will want to buy better products in. Like I find the thermometer, nail files and the clippers are all I've used yet for my 2 month old. (I like the nasal bulb I got from the hospital better.)
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as pic but still nice
customer_reviews.text: Not what is advertised, but you get all the necessities you need so I'm not even mad I like this case better though its cuter
customer_reviews.author: Elvira

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with everything you need for your baby and best part is it comes in a great little zip bag which fits perfect inside a diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Morgan

customer_reviews.title: A Great Baby Shower Gift
customer_reviews.text: This makes for a wonderful baby shower gift for the first time parents to be. It includes the necessities for the nursery and diaper bag such as a comb and brush, a medicine dispenser, finger tip toothbrush and toddler toothbrush, a rattle, mirror and different other tools they will need to get through the baby's first years. A must have for the first time parents.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Daly

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It's a good basics kit, but you'll need to expand it.
customer_reviews.author: Panka

customer_reviews.title: Bulk bag
customer_reviews.text: It has everything that you need but the case is large and bulky. There is an excessive amount of leftover room in the bag after you remove the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This kit has been great since the beginning. The soft brush is great and the comb was especially helpful when she had cradle cap. The thermometer works great and the nail scissors are wonderful since clipping her nails makes me nervous I will clip her skin. Also, my daughter loves the rattle.
customer_reviews.author: Sarita

customer_reviews.title: Pick a different set.
customer_reviews.text: The thermometer takes forever to read temp. With a wiggling infant or a less than compliant young toddler it’s almost impossible to get an accurate read. The nail clipper doesn’t work worth a darn. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: angela johnson

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's great. I don't have any reason to use the ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's great. I don't have any reason to use the scissors,but use the nail clippers and file on a regular basis. I already lost the thermometer and the rattle is kind of pointless but nice of them to include as a distraction for the little one.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our baby. It has everything you need for your child. It even has a rattle for your child. I think we might use it on us more than the baby. Hahaha everything works really good and it's reliable. You can take it with you anywhere, and it's easy to store in your diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: s_cruz

customer_reviews.title: This rather inexpensive set is pretty much a good starting point for the new baby
customer_reviews.text: This rather inexpensive set is pretty much a good starting point for the new baby. It comes with some essentials that we will be using for the forseable future to just basically take care of our new baby. Everything is in good quality and the bag keeps everything nice and organized.
customer_reviews.author: MSMJ Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: good services.
customer_reviews.text: excellent cheap and good quality good services I am fascinated with this first aid kit for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: maximo quezada

customer_reviews.title: the person who received it seemed really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift for a baby shower, the person who received it seemed really happy with it, and I believe she has used it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Great Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My friend was so thankful for the gift and it was very necessary!
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Great gathering of essentials.  Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the buy. Appears to be good quality. Lots of essentials and recipient liked the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: This is an essential item for first time moms. I bought this for a baby shower gift for a friend. Its definitely a good gift idea.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Will be purchasing a 2nd one for travel
customer_reviews.text: I've seen a lot of first aid kits sold in stores, but none as complete as this one and at such a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The worst product I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: This is really worst product. The thermometer does not work. Other items are really cheap. Do not waste your money for this.
customer_reviews.author: Bokotuwa Gamage

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Has everything you could need plus room to add anything else you already have.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Yepez

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a baby shower gift for my niece and she really appreciated getting it.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not the super. You can get half of these gadgets from ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not the super. You can get half of these gadgets from the hospital when your baby is born, and the rest gadgets individually for better brand and quality.

customer_reviews.title: It is very good
customer_reviews.text: Some of the articles of the kit are a bit weak, but overall it is great.
customer_reviews.author: David - Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good kit but quality is average
customer_reviews.text: Comprehensive package that gets you most of what you will need for your baby but the items are of lower quality, obviously, than if you were to purchase parts of this kit individually. For example, the included syringe melted when sanitized.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Get it. You won’t be disappointed. Always good to have.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used like everything in here atleast once and was super helpful
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Ockey

customer_reviews.title: Not sure why I bought it...
customer_reviews.text: I only used one thing in this whole package so far... about half year... the rest of stuff still new....
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: There are better
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I haven't even used all of the items, but of the ones I have used, not all of them were good quality. The nail clippers are fine, as are the comb, brush, and little trimmers. The aspirator is crap. You can't even squeeze it. I'm not sure what the purpose of the rattle is. If I wanted to distract my kid I would have something much more interesting- even a mirror would work better. You probably won't even need the two toothbrushes that are included- I got a training toothbrush and it's a lot better. Overall, I would say definitely order the pieces separately and make a gift basket that way.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: Great little kit for baby. Pretty complete. My wife made an observation that will probably cause me to purchase this one again "This is the perfect baby shower gift" Oh yeah! Everything we wish we had when we started having kids 10 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Stanford Robert Harrison

product_meta.title: American Red Cross Deluxe Health and Grooming Kit| Infant and Baby Grooming | Infant and Baby Health | Thermometer, Medicine Dispenser, Comb, Brush, Nail Clippers and More with Convenient Tote
product_meta.description: The American Red Cross Deluxe Baby Healthcare and Grooming Kit is a robust collection of nursery items that includes a nasal aspirator, digital thermometer with case, comfort tip medicine spoon with cap, brush, comb, baby nail clipper, fingertip toothbrush, toddler toothbrush, a mirror and more—all zipped into a deluxe travel/storage tote with an easy-view window that lets you see exactly what’s inside. It even includes a baby care, wellness and safety guide so you can master every task with confidence. The easy-view tote bag is the perfect place for keeping all these nursery essentials together, both at home and on the go. Contained Battery Type Alkaline
feature_bullets: DELUXE BABY HEALTH KIT: This grooming kit is essential for your baby and provides all the items needed from infant to toddler
EASY VIEW TOTE BAG: Items come in a tote that keeps things together and is easy to carry around at home or on the go
GROOMING ITEMS: Include toddler brush, comb, scissors, nail clipper, fingertip toothbrush, toddler toothbrush, and a mirror
HEALTH ITEMS: Health items include nasal aspirator, digital thermometer with case, medicine dropper, and comfort tip medicine spoon with cap
BABY GUIDE: Includes a baby care, wellness and safety guide
